artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape with figures on a road stretching between buildings in distance; trees at left and in middle ground; mountain peak in background, center; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: Censor seals: 米良 {Mera}, 渡辺 {Watanabe}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Aoyama in Edo from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
